entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing net9.0 SDK on AWS Linux 2023 breaks net8.0 SDK and runtime #45440
  • Clear Communication regarding Servicing Releases #45426
  • Deprecate :: in favor of @ in dotnet new install command #45422

Closed

  • Installing MAUI workload on M1 MacBook Pro gets stuck. #45023
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: The specified version does not contain a valid major, minor, and patch version: '9.0.100.1'.." displays after installing the workload set from global.json. #45424
  • Tests failed in CI: restore failed with Response status code does not indicate success: 409 (Public access is not permitted on this storage account #45417
  • The Visual Studio version on the .NET 10.0 SDK installer page is incorrect #45032

PullRequests

Created

  • (Draft) Remove `SlnFile` #45442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable ASP.NET Core installers on Linux in the VMR #45437
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24612.1 #45435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45427
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add support for .NET 9.0 web project templates #45423
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new

Merged

  • Make sure that sdk manifest has RepoOrigin attribute #45444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes middleware invocation arguments use by legacy apply update code path #45298
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use legacy WASM APIs when newer ones are not available #45317
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove global usings from projects building source packages #45339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the LLVMJIT jobs from the VMR #45443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45096
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch, 9.0.2
  • Workaround for MSbuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync throwing on unrecognized project language #44928
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 9.0.2
  • Add `testfx` to VMR's source mappings #45429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory now that we run with native contai… #45428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WASM] Clean up of `HybridGlobalization` in tests #45412
    Area-Infrastructure, arch-wasm, untriaged, 10.0.1xx
  • Fix manifest artifacts reading #45407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use library-packs also when RestoreAdditionalProjectSources is explicitly set. #44863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45364
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix a set of test issues caused by an old blob feed and try to fix up the nullable change we rushed in #45420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add netcoreapp9.1 tfm to It_fails_to_build_if_targeting_a_higher_framework_than_is_supported test #45409
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-watch] Improve failure reporting in tests #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #45383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45400
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix `Change failed to apply (error code: ...)` intermittent failures #45097
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Watch, 9.0.2
  • Change the Windows dev versions leg to x86 #45362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [9.0.2xx] sln migrate, sln list, sln add #45408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • allow reading all mcr image names #44738
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Prepare GenAPI so it can be used for a new assembly diff generator #45389
    untriaged, Team:Runtime, Area-Tools
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Read global.json to decide to run dotnet test in vstest or testing platform mode #45418
    Area-DotNet Test, config-system-candidate
